name: Aldecaldos
description: The Aldecaldos are one of the largest nomad groups in North America, and a member of the Seven Nations. The Aldecaldo family was the first true nomad family to form during the 1990s as Los Angeles turned into a warzone. Juan Aldecaldo started out in the defense industry, and much of the extended Aldecaldo family depended on Juan for various needs. Juan led a family migration from the US to Mexico City, and as time went on his leadership became stronger. The Aldecaldos returned to the US with...
